tool_description: The PubNub Network makes Real-time Communications Simple with an easy API. It provides a web-scale API for businesses to build scalable Data Push communication apps on Mobile, Tablet, and Web, utilizing bidirectional JSON for Send/Receive (Publish/Subscribe) functionalities.

api_list.name: History
api_list.description: Retrieve older messages from a specified channel.

required_parameters.name: callback
required_parameters.description: JSONP Callback for handling the response.

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: The maximum number of messages to return.

required_parameters.name: subscribe_key
required_parameters.description: The key used to subscribe to the channel.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The name of the channel from which to retrieve messages.

api_list.name: Time
api_list.description: Get the current timetoken from the PubNub Network.

required_parameters.name: callback
required_parameters.description: JSONP Callback for handling the response.
